description:
The girls take a vacation at Inaho`s villa, only to be attacked by a monster maid!   The monster puts them in a delicate situation, where one girls comes to their villa only to find a squatter living there already, and then somebody else comes to do an open house.  An epic villa-pun battle breaks out to determine who will win the villa.  Can they transform while sharing their bitter summer memories and defeat this villa villain?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsuyasumi wa Inaho no Bessou de Vacance Nari?
Take a Summer Vacation at Inaho`s Villa?
夏休みはいなほの別荘でバカンスなり?
